name: [Dam1] Retreat on slight hull damage
desc: Orders the ship to retreat when falling below 90%% hull integrity.%n%nThis order will only be given once.

name: [Dam2] Retreat on medium hull damage
desc: Orders the ship to retreat when falling below 60%% hull integrity.%n%nThis order will only be given once.

name: [Dam3] Retreat on heavy hull damage
desc: Orders the ship to retreat when falling below 30%% hull integrity.%n%nThis order will only be given once.

name: [Msl] Retreat when no missile left
desc: Orders the ship to retreat when it does not have any missile left.%n%nThis order will only be given once.

name: [CR1] Retreat on degraded performance
desc: Orders the ship to retreat when it has exceeded its peak performance time.%n%nThis order will only be given once.

name: [CR2] Retreat on low performance
desc: Orders the ship to retreat when it has exceeded its peak performance time and it is below 60%% Combat Readiness.%n%nThis order will only be given once.

name: [CR3] Retreat on possible malfunction
desc: Orders the ship to retreat when it has exceeded its peak performance time and it is below 40%% Combat Readiness.%n%nThis order will only be given once.

name: [CR4] Retreat on CR gone
desc: Orders the ship to retreat when it has 0%% Combat Readiness left.%n%nThis order will only be given once.
